dt-example.title: Dropdowns: Spacers
dt-example.info:
The [previous example](./nested.html) showed a common UI paradigm in operating system menus - nested dropdowns. Another common pattern is to use a separator to group similar items together, allowing the end user to quickly scan over the list, finding the group they want and then refining that to the option they want.
ColumnControl has a built in `-content spacer` type for exactly this purpose. It can be used at the top level to provide a vertical bar between buttons, or in a dropdown to show a horizontal bar. Both are shown in this example.
Next: [Dropdown titles](./titles.html).
